```{r, chunk1, eval = FALSE }
textInput( "main", "main", "my main" )
checkboxInput( "horizontal", "horizontal" )
library( shinyLikert )

plot(
  renderShinyLikert( createTestData(),
                     main =  reactive({input$main}),
                     horizontal = reactive({input$horizontal}),
                     as.percent = TRUE )
)
```
